HomePage.heroDescription: AIBoMGen ensures trustability and integrity in AI model training with automated AI Bill of Materials (AIBoM) generation.
HomePage.featuresDescription: AIBoMGen is designed to ensure trustability, integrity, and reproducibility in AI model training.
HomePage.featureTrustabilityDescription: Generate cryptographically signed AI Bills of Materials (AIBoMs) for tamper-proof training processes.
HomePage.featureArtifactManagementDescription: Efficiently manage datasets, models, logs, and other artifacts with integrated storage solutions.
HomePage.featureScalabilityDescription: Leverage distributed training with Celery workers for scalable and efficient execution.

Profile.guestWarning: You are logged in as a guest. You are only able to use verification features.

AppSidebar.title: AIBoMGen
AppSidebar.privacyDescription: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information. We only collect data necessary to provide our services, such as your name, email address, and usage information. Your data will never be shared with third parties without your explicit consent, unless required by law. We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. By using our application, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.
AppSidebar.cookieDescription: Manage your cookie preferences for this application.
AppSidebar.cookieExplanation: We use cookies to enhance your experience and improve our services. You can choose to accept or reject all cookies.
